plot: The Silver Kid, a reformed outlaw, and Red, a notorious desperado, battle corrupt law enforcement and tame a wild Western town by gunning down the maniacal Dover Gang Midget.
title: The Silver Kid
plot_es: The Silver Kid, a reformed outlaw, and Red, a notorious desperado, battle corrupt law enforcement and tame a wild Western town by gunning down the maniacal Dover Gang Midget.
plot_en: The Silver Kid, a reformed outlaw, and Red, a notorious desperado, battle corrupt law enforcement and tame a wild Western town by gunning down the maniacal Dover Gang Midget.
